mapper.insert: insert into lg_receivingparty (receivingPartyId, receivingName, phone, address, prescriptionRequirement, receiptRequest, returnPeriod, cooperationStatus, minimumGrossRate, remarks, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{receivingpartyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receivingname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prescriptionrequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiptrequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnperiod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cooperationstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minimumgrossrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_receivingparty set receivingName = #{receivingname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prescriptionRequirement = #{prescriptionrequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiptRequest = #{receiptrequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnPeriod = #{returnperiod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cooperationStatus = #{cooperationstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minimumGrossRate = #{minimumgrossrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where receivingPartyId = #{receivingpartyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select receivingPartyId, receivingName, phone, address, prescriptionRequirement, receiptRequest, returnPeriod, cooperationStatus, minimumGrossRate, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_receivingparty where receivingPartyId = #{receivingpartyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
